name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Toolbar - Reclaim Your Time Now

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your life. Generate, Respond, Voice activation, combine prompts, Summarize text anywhere in the Web at no charge!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This powerful and efficient Chatgpt powered Virtual Assistant with over 70,000 weekly active users is guaranteed to SAVE YOU TIME!

Introducing AI Toolbar: Your Productivity Superstar! You will now have your very own personal assistant, to deal with the tasks you hate! Relax and make yourself a hot tea!

Key Features:

Time-Saving Efficiency: Slash your daily tasks and free up your precious time.

Effortless Email Handling: AI Toolbar composes brilliant replies, effortlessly tackling your inbox overload.

Voice Commands: Simply speak your desires to AI Toolbar, and it will carry them out, no buttons or keyboard wrestling required.

- Multilingual Genius: Translate, summarize, and paraphrase any selected text, breaking down language barriers effortlessly.
Chatbot Feature:

- Engage in witty banter, gather information, and export it in Word or PDF formats with ease.

- Seamless Integration with Chatgpt: Partnered with Chatgpt, a rockstar language model, to skyrocket your results and efficiency.

Join nearly 100,000 Professionals: Embrace the AI Toolbar revolution and transform the way you work.

Become a Workplace Superhero: Conquer your tasks, unleash your productivity, and be the hero of your own success story.
Grab AI Toolbar today, let it handle the heavy lifting, and enjoy the sweet taste of victory while sipping your coffee. Don't be left behind in a world of manual labor and outdated routines â€“ join the revolution and become a productivity superhero!

Features:
1) select any text on a webpage and speak or type your command
2) reply to emails with minimal input.
3) save your prompts
4) Prompt Builder with over 300 Combinable (Tones, type, Length, Purpose, Excel, ETC..)
5) Voice Prompts - Speak to the Chatbot
4) Export outputs in Word and PDF 
5) Automation Tools (Undetectable AI and Video Generation)

Instructions
Step 1 - Sign Up or Log in

Step 2 Open your email or any page, article containing text

Step 3 Select a piece of text with your Mouse and watch the magic happen!

Step 4 - If you are using chatgpt, open it to enjoy our integrated toolbar. 

Our innovative extension provides over 300 combinable prompts with different functionalities, tones, and purposes, so you can easily customize the conversations and written content provided by OpenAI's API. 

AI Toolbar, also allows for voice control, making it easy to dictate your ideas and have them transcribed in real-time. This feature is especially useful for those who prefer to speak their ideas rather than write them down. 

It also allows you to save your common and most used Prompts, and avoid over engineering the creation of prompts and having to keep an external database of Prompts.

Finally, Ai Toolbar, also allows for easy word and PDF exports from, so you can share your work with others quickly and easily. Whether you're working on a school project, a business report, or just need to send a quick message, we have you covered. 

So why wait? Download the AI Toolbar Chrome extension today and take your ChatGpt to the next level!. 

Third-Party Links 

Our Chrome extension may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by AI Toolbar such as the OpenAi website in order to access GPT3.5. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these third-party websites or services. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any third-party websites or services you visit. 

Visit the privacy policy section for more information.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time by posting a new version on our website.
Contact Us 
ultimatetoolbargpt@gmal.com

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, or want to cancel any upgrades or subscriptions please contact us at ultimatetoolbargpt@gmail.com 

To cancel an existing subscription please send an email titled Cancel and it will be deleted within 24h, The plans do not provide refunds but you will be able to use the pro version until your renewal date.  

UPDATES
Update for issue with Log in and sign up occurred on 08/10/2023 FIX Released 

We had a ton of requests to enable users to perform more bespoke actions, however we cannot do it all ourselves. We have included a number of AI services under the "Automation" section. These include, Plagiarism tools, Image and video generators, Website builders, Competitor analytics, Chatbots, AI voice automation and many more, hope you enjoy our work!
